integrations.name: Jaeger
integrations.title: Tracing Dashboard
description: Jaeger collects traces and shows the complete funnel from user request to the impact in the backend

integrations.name: Kibana
integrations.title: Logging
description: Kibana stores KrakenD logs and allows analysis

integrations.name: Grafana
integrations.title: Monitoring & metrics
description: Grafana Monitoring shows the usage of KrakenD and reveals low-level metrics.

integrations.name: OpenAPI
integrations.title: Documentation
description: Create automatically OpenAPI documentation with krakend openapi export, or create the gateway configuration from an existing OpenAPI file with krakend openapi import.
integrations.command: docker-compose exec krakend_ee krakend openapi export -c /etc/krakend/krakend.json -o /etc/krakend/demo/swagger.json

integrations.name: Postman
integrations.title: Postman
description: Generate Postman collections to use the gateway endpoints with krakend generate postman
integrations.command: docker-compose exec krakend_ee krakend generate postman -c /etc/krakend/krakend.json -o /etc/krakend/demo/postman.json

integrations.name: Keycloak
integrations.title: Identity Providers
description: Keycloak and many other identity providers can be integrated with KrakenD.
